text: DON'T MISS 'I can't sleep': Bianca Gascoigne breaks down in tears on Loose Women as she's labelled 'a cheat' by her ex after CBB romance with Jamie O'Hara Dressed WAY down! Pregnant Beyonce is unusually glam-free in T-shirt and sneakers as she shops in Beverly Hills after stunning at Grammys 'I'm the younger sister now!' Linda Nolan teases sibling Coleen as she unveils new wrinkle-free visage after going under the knife for first ever daytime TV facelift Ready for a romantic reunion? Spencer Matthews jets back to the UK with The Jump co-stars as his relationship with Vogue Williams is confirmed Viewers slam Alison Hammond's 'shocking behaviour' as she pretends to pour diet pills down her throat on This Morning during half term week 'Gingerama': Little Mix stunner Jesy Nelson shows off her new bright orange locks in her latest selfie Certainly on fire with her bold new look The bombshells of Keeping Up With The Kardashians! Kylie Jenner shares throwback bikini snap with Kim and Khloe from Costa Rica Red hot! Georgia May Foote flashes her underwear in semi-sheer flamenco-inspired ensemble as she leads the glamour at Teatum Jones LFW show 'Furious' Charlotte Crosby 'ENDS six-week romance with Stephen Bear'... after he asks another woman if she 'fancies a sh*g' on Celebs Go Dating Booty-ful! Rhian Sugden beams as she flashes a cheeky glimpse of her perky posterior during second non-surgical bum lift procedure A look back at Dev Patel's VERY awkward sex scene in Skins... as Lion actor admits his 'heart rate rises' when he thinks about his Oscar nomination Tilda the Time Lord? Swinton tipped to enter the Tardis as new favorite to replace Peter Capaldi as Doctor Who Could the 13th Doctor be a woman It's a little nippy out here! Braless Chrissy Teigen puts on a busty display as she braves New York's wintry weather in sheer turquoise blouse Justin Bieber called in sick to deposition over ripping off hit song - but posts photos of himself chugging beers with friends just hours later 'I will continue to speak the truth': Selena Gomez says she is 'very grateful' after hitting 110 million Instagram followers Sent her thanks He's Too Good to you! Drake splashes out on lavish ¬£30k bash at London nightclub for his entourage after tour Headed to London's Paper nightclub Traveling in style! A look inside the $7k per night luxury cruise ship Bella Thorne is staying on as she enjoys bikini vacation in the Caribbean 'Teaching him a move or two!': Louise Redknapp throws some shapes around the kitchen with father-in-law Harry in energetic video The morning after! Make-up free Stacey Solomon and Joe Swash look considerably less glamorous as they step out following romantic date the night before Marnie Simpson squeezes into a low-cut leather dress as she nearly takes a tumble on big night out with Geordie Shore cast members Braless Chloe Ferry comes dangerously close to a nip slip in a VERY plunging khaki bodysuit as she parties with Geordie Shore cast during wild night out Isn't she's sweet enough? Leggy Nicola McLean poses in nothing but an array of racy T-shirts as she poses up a storm for candy-inspired shoot All she needs is a horse! Selma Blair wears her riding clothes and boots while running errands in LA In her riding clothes Blooming lovely! Myleene Klass flashes a hint of cleavage in plunging floral top as she steps out after presenting radio show EXCLUSIVE: Marvin Humes on his daughter Alaia's friendship with Simon Cowell's son Eric and how marriage to pregnant wife Rochelle is 'not perfect' Charlie Hunnam has saucy proposition for Alison Hammond on This Morning... as viewers express confusion over his Geordie accent 'It's all about Shai!' Maksim Chmerkovskiy 'disappointed' baby doesn't look like him... and won't let his and Peta Murgatroyd's son be a dancer Teresa Giudice's daughter Milania, 11, looks like a Disney princess in her tiered dress and TIARA for communion Budding beauty! Iskra Lawrence flaunts her sensational curves in a flirty floral print dress as she storms the Teatum LFW show Love Island's Olivia Buckland shows off her toned tum and ample cleavage in a racy bandeau crop top at the Angus Chiang LFW show with beau Alex Sold! Kurt Russell and Goldie Hawn offload palatial Pacific Palisades home for $6.9 million Purchased in 2004 for less than $4.12 million Rosie Huntington-Whiteley shows off her baby bump during first public appearance since pregnancy announcement as she attends clothing launch EastEnders bosses confirm Danny Dyer will be taking a break... as it's claimed 'drunk' star is handed 'enforced break by producers to sort his life out' Stacey Solomon flashes her bra in sheer shirt as she enjoys date with Joe Swash... after lamenting the 'stigma' of having two children by different fathers Done! Jennifer Garner 'is set to file for divorce' from Ben Affleck 20 MONTHS after split... and he has already 'moved out of $17m family mansion' Towie star Cara Kilbey's boyfriend says he has 'champagne tastes but lemonade wages' as he denies living in luxury as a cocaine kingpin Liam Neeson plants a red nose on on-off girlfriend Freya St Johnston as she supports him at filming of Love Actually Comic Relief special Shades of grey: Queen Mathilde of Belgium looks anything but dull in a chic coat dress and hat at a commemorative mass in Brussels Watch the hilarious results of James Corden's parents interviewing celebs as they go behind-the-scenes at the Grammys 'We know you still love him!' Louis Tomlinson's fans rejoice as ex-girlfriend Eleanor Calder follows him again on Instagram following split from Danielle Campbell Model mom! Christie Brinkley, 63, rocks red jumpsuit at Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue launch with daughters Alexa Ray, 31, and Sailor, 18 Golden girl! Kelly Bensimon glows as she shows off her tanned skin in chic little black dress during the middle of New York's winter Always stylish Blue eyeshadow + burgundy lipstick = beauty PERFECTION on models like Gigi Hadid and Kendall Jenner at the Anna Sui fall 2017 runway show Getting her money's worth! Thrifty Queen Letizia recycles a tweed dress within weeks of first wearing it as she attends an exhibition opening Broken Beckham! Brooklyn wears his arm in a sling after nasty fall while skiing in Whistler Canada 17-year-old took a spill on the slopes Former TOWIE star Elliott Wright's fianc√©e Sadie Stuart flashes her bra in semi-sheer black top as the pair enjoy a romantic dinner date Jemma Lucy sizzles as she flaunts her sensational figure in a skin-tight bandage dress for wild night out in Liverpool Who's ready for fall? Star are plugging Popski London's bomber jackets made from real raccoon and rabbit pelts 'Just give him food and he'll love you forever!' Pierce Brosnan cradles his granddaughter as he joins his son and daughter-in-law for a Beverly Hills walk From Brentwood to Hollywood! Ferne McCann sizzles in tight leather trousers as she jets off to Los Angeles on an assignment for This Morning The two Hillarys: Clinton pictured at dinner with her SNL doppelganger Kate McKinnon They last dined together in a 2015 sketch Model Hunter McGrady showcases her fabulous curves in a sheer plunging jumpsuit at the Sports Illustrated cover launch Bindi Irwin shares a poignant post comparing her late father Steve to brother Robert, 13, as he makes his late-night debut on Jimmy Fallon Sombre Karlie Kloss steps out for the first time since apologising for 'culturally insensitive' Geisha shoot in Vogue's 'diversity' edition Model behaviour! Ajak Deng perfects the off-duty look in a cropped sweater and jeans as she joins Bella Hadid for New York book launch Lottie Moss dazzles in a pretty printed minidress at the Marc Jacobs NYFW show after mocking supermodel sister Kate in hilarious meme Goodbye, goodbye: Gorden Kaye's Allo, Allo co-stars turn out to say farewell to 'shy boy from Huddersfield' who became King of Comedy as hapless Rene EXCLUSIVE: Lisa Marie Presley's twins in child protective services after she found 'indecent photos' of children on their dad's computer, court papers claim Jorgie Porter rocks sexy LBD as she clutches a red rose after shooting Celebs Go Dating... just DAYS after a smooching mystery hunk 'Loving life!' Busty Natasha Hamilton showcases her sizzling body in a skimpy bikini as she enjoys a beach day with buff new fianc√© Charles Gay Tamara Ecclestone and Sophia sport matching cornrows as they enjoy a dolphin experience... after speaking out in defence of breast-feeding Harrison Ford sounded confused before airport near-miss and 'wrongly told air traffic control he was flying a helicopter instead of a plane' Fancy seeing you here! George Clooney's mother excitedly confirms that the actor's wife Amal is expecting a boy and a girl Animal magnetism! Steve Irwin's son Robert, 13, introduces a TERRIFIED Jimmy Fallon to a baby crocodile and a boa constrictor in his late-night TV debut Robert Pattinson and fiancee FKA twigs put on a touchy feely display as they make a rare public appearance together at The Lost City Of Z premiere Dudley who? Kendall Jenner rocks a faux-fur coat and shades as she celebrates end of NYFW with glam pals Kaia and Presley Gerber Nina Agdal looks glowing as she shows off her sensational curves in a nude corset-style gown at Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue launch Ashley Graham displays her incredible curves in a sexy leather dress as she celebrates her sizzling spread in Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue Leggy Kate Upton flaunts her famous curves in a plunging blazer dress as she celebrates her Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Edition cover in NYC Now THAT'S a line-up! The Voice's Delta Goodrem and Seal join new judges Kelly Rowland and Boy George as they step out in Sydney 'My whole life was falling apart': Drew Barrymore reveals filming her new Netflix series became a 'safe place' after split from husband Will Kopelman Ex EastEnders star John Partridge speaks out about 'intense pressure' of the soap... amid claims Danny Dyer has been asked to take an 'enforced break' 'I'm a sucker for pain': Charlotte Crosby reacts to 'boyfriend' Stephen Bear's Celebs Go Dating appearance... before he sarcastically shoots her down Bikini-clad Hilary Duff packs on PDA with new beau Matthew Koma during steamy Costa Rica holiday... as her ex Mike Comrie faces rape allegations Set for pop stardom, the bedroom singer aged 18 who's only left Cornwall twice (but has had ten million views on social media) Blossoming Beyonce! Pregnant singer shows off her ample cleavage in VERY low cut gown slit to the hip in snaps from her exclusive post-Grammy bash Making a splash! Kim Kardashian is soaking wet as she wears see-through white top in sultry Costa Rica throwback photos 'This won't end well': Rob Kardashian and Blac Chyna split AGAIN after she 'disappears for days at a time' Multiple sources have confirmed split 'I miss my babies': Kim Kardashian yearns for North and Saint... while she considers Paris return 'as Kanye West wants her to attend fashion week' 'Got caught in this awk pose': Bella Thorne shares photo fail in tiny bikini during Caribbean cruise Tried to capture a candid moment on the beach 'How about we just hang out?' Kate Hudson discusses the pitfalls of celebs using dating apps and reveals she would rather 'meet a guy in Starbucks' 'I hadn't worked for a while': Rachel Griffiths reveals why she chose to work with controversial director Mel Gibson No bikinis needed! Kate Upton, Ashley Graham and Nina Agdal ooze sex appeal on red carpet for Sports Illustrated release party Jeremy McConnell is STILL in Liverpool five days after arriving to meet baby son Caben Albi while making amends with ex Stephanie Davis Brooke Burke-Charvet has a Baywatch moment as she displays her enviable figure in stripy bikini on the beach in St Barts Golden girl!
